string.text: This is an ITEM test string
This is a another ITEM test string

A powerful electronic lockpick. Strangely enough, it does not seem to be an all-purpose thieves' instrument. Rather, it seems to have been created with a specific electronic lock in mind and can't be used to override anything else.
Plastic document file. You'd need a degree in biology to understand a word of what it says.
A thick pile of scientific documents. You'd need a degree in biology to understand a word of what it says.
A worn manuscript in leather binding. Written by Hawkeye himself. Judging by the headings alone, it might explain some of the Zone's secrets.
Documents from the secret stash in Pripyat
A heavy wooden crate with the word "Explosives" written in several languages
Flash drive - the best way to store and transfer information.
Flash drive - the best way to store and transfer information.
Flash drive - the best way to store and transfer information.
Flash drive - the best way to store and transfer information.
Flash drive from Hawkeye's secret stash
Electronic key to the underground Lab X18.
Mole's flash drive with information about Hawkeye's secret stash
Personal digital assistant. Indispensable in the Zone.
Personal digital assistant. Indispensable in the Zone.
Military documents from the Agroprom R&D Institute
A prototype developed by scientists to protect people from psi-emissions. Not functional.
Functional prototype developed by scientists to protect people from psi-emissions
